title:
Who owns the yacht that is in dry dock on the Cape Fear River, just south of the new bridge?  Will it ever cruise again?



Thank you & have a great day! 

(Sorry I don\'t know the name of the bridge; new to the area.)
text:
Could you provide any more details? There are several marinas and
boat yards in that area and I'm trying to narrow this down. Which
side of the river? And can you give a description of the boat?
